Return ICD-10-PCS Code as a gt Table

Source: R/gt_print.R
gt_pcs2.Rd

Return ICD-10-PCS Code as a gt Table

Usage

gt_pcs2(x)

Arguments

x

an object of class pcs.

Value

description

Examples

pcs("0G9000Z") |> gt_pcs2()



  
0G9000Z  Drainage of Pituitary Gland with Drainage Device, Open Approach
    

  

    ICD-10-PCS 2024
  



    
1
Section
0
Medical and Surgical
2
Body System
G
Endocrine System
3
Operation
9
Drainage
4
Body Part
0
Pituitary Gland
5
Approach
0
Open
6
Device
0
Drainage Device
7
Qualifier
Z
No Qualifier

gt_pcs2(pcs("0016070"))



  
0016070  Bypass Cerebral Ventricle to Nasopharynx with Autologous Tissue Substitute, Open Approach
    

  

    ICD-10-PCS 2024
  



    
1
Section
0
Medical and Surgical
2
Body System
0
Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
3
Operation
1
Bypass
4
Body Part
6
Cerebral Ventricle
5
Approach
0
Open
6
Device
7
Autologous Tissue Substitute
7
Qualifier
0
Nasopharynx
